item.title: 杨忠礼电力公司探索南非的数据中心：媒体
item.description: 据当地媒体报道，永利国际电力公司正在探索在南非建设数据中心并成为发电商。【原文：YTL Power International is exploring building data centers and becoming a power producer in South Africa, according to local media.】

item.title: 比特币持续走弱，加密货币在经历一周 "蹂躏 "后趋于稳定
item.description: 本周伊始，比特币就遭遇了长期的抛售，这使得比特币成为自2022年以来表现最差的一个月。【原文：Bitcoin began the week on the back foot following a prolonged selloff that has put the token on track for its worst month since 2022.】

item.title: 印度股市新高掩盖了隐形修正
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: GoTo 任命新首席执行官，向改变游戏规则的 Grab 接管迈进
item.description: GoTo 集团任命了一位新的首席执行官接替 Patrick Walujo，此举有望加速 Grab 控股有限公司对这家印尼最大互联网公司的收购。【原文：GoTo Group appointed a new chief executive officer to replace Patrick Walujo, a move that’s expected to speed the takeover of Indonesia’s largest internet company by Grab Holdings Ltd.】

item.title: 中国铝冶炼厂创鑫在香港交易首日上涨
item.description: 中国铝冶炼企业创鑫实业控股有限公司（Chuangxin Industries Holdings Ltd.）首次公开募股募集了 55 亿港元（7.07 亿美元）资金，在香港首次上市交易中涨幅居前。【原文：Chinese aluminum smelter Chuangxin Industries Holdings Ltd. gained in its Hong Kong trading debut after an initial public offering that raised HK$5.5 billion ($707 million).】

item.title: JD.com 供应链技术部门评估香港上市兴趣
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，JD.com 公司的供应链技术部门已开始评估香港首次公开募股的兴趣，可能在未来几周内募集到约 5 亿美元的资金，这将使其完成两年多来的上市尝试。【原文：JD.com Inc.’s supply-chain technology unit has started gauging interest for a Hong Kong initial public offering that may raise around $500 million in the coming weeks, people familiar with the matter said, setting it on course to complete a more than two-year attempt to go public.】

item.title: 英国在预算前魅力攻势中削减企业能源账单
item.description: 从 2027 年开始，英国将为 7000 多家制造商削减 25% 的能源费用，因为政府试图在下周的增税预算之前吸引企业。【原文：The UK will cut energy bills by 25% for more than 7,000 manufacturers beginning in 2027 as the government attempts to charm businesses ahead of a tax-raising budget next week.】

item.title: 市场权衡美国再次降息的可能性，黄金保持稳定
item.description: 由于市场权衡了美联储在未来几个月再次降息的可能性，黄金在亚洲持稳。【原文：Gold was steady in Asia as the market weighed the chances of another Federal Reserve rate cut in the coming months.】

item.title: DroneShield 出售高管股份后将更改激励计划
item.description: DroneShield Ltd. 将改变其期权激励框架，并正在对其信息披露和证券交易政策进行独立审查，此前该公司高层领导一连串的股票快速抛售引起了投资者的愤怒。【原文：DroneShield Ltd. will change its options incentive framework and is undertaking an independent review of its disclosure and securities trading policies, after a string of rapid share sales from the firm’s top leadership drew the ire of investors.】

item.title: 交易商评估乌克兰问题协议前景，油价延续跌势
item.description: 石油创下自 10 月初以来的最大单周跌幅后下跌，原因是交易商权衡了乌克兰与俄罗斯达成和平协议的前景，该协议可能会增加原油流入本已供应充足的市场。【原文：Oil dropped after posting the biggest weekly loss since early October, as traders weighed the prospect of a Ukraine-Russia peace deal that could increase crude flows into an already well-supplied market.】

item.title: Netflix 一直避免做大交易。那么，它为什么想要华纳兄弟？
item.description: 拥有热门电影和电视节目库将彻底改变 Netflix【原文：Owning a library of hit movies and TV shows would change Netflix forever】

item.title: 中国对铜的控制为不成功便成仁的供应谈判埋下伏笔
item.description: 本周，支撑全球铜加工业的定价机制将面临重大压力测试，谈判将在地缘政治局势高度紧张、金属供应有限以及中国的主导地位使其他地方的冶炼厂难以生存的情况下展开。【原文：A pricing mechanism underpinning the global copper-processing industry faces a major stress test this week, with negotiations coming to a head at a time when geopolitical tensions are running high, metal is limited and China’s dominance has left smelters elsewhere struggling to survive.】

item.title: 花旗财富主管认为牛市将因创纪录的资金流入而上扬
item.description: 花旗集团财富主管表示，股票牛市仍有 "一定的运行空间"，因为这家华尔街巨头今年正吸引着创纪录的富裕客户资金流入。【原文：Citigroup Inc.’s wealth chief says the equity bull market still has “some room to run” as the Wall Street giant is luring record inflows from rich clients this year.】

item.title: 亚洲股市开盘谨慎乐观：市场综述
item.description: 受美联储可能降息以及美国官员可能允许向中国出售英伟达（Nvidia）人工智能芯片的报道支撑，亚洲市场开盘看涨。【原文：Asian markets look set for a positive open, supported by improved sentiment over potential Federal Reserve rate cuts and reports that US officials may permit the sale of Nvidia AI chips to China.】

item.title: 麦格理资产管理公司出价 75 亿美元收购 Qube
item.description: 麦格理资产管理公司（Macquarie Asset Management）提出收购 Qube 控股有限公司（Qube Holdings Ltd. ），该交易对这家澳大利亚物流和海运集装箱公司的估值为 116 亿澳元（75 亿美元）。【原文：Macquarie Asset Management offered to buy Qube Holdings Ltd. in a deal valuing the Australian logistics and shipping-containers company at A$11.6 billion ($7.5 billion).】

item.title: 将 8% 的收益率变为 16% 的被禁止的中国债券策略正在咆哮回归
item.description:
银行正在帮助投资者获得远远超过官方利率的债券回报，而这一切都发生在人们的视线之外。【原文：

Banks are helping investors secure bond returns that far exceed official rates — and it’s all happening out of view.

】

item.title: 房地产价格飙升吸引竞拍者购买越南废弃塔楼
item.description: 在胡志明市的中心地带，一座由近 3,800 套废弃公寓组成的庞大建筑群在经历了四次失败的拍卖之后，重新回到了市场上。【原文：In the heart of Ho Chi Minh City, a sprawling complex of nearly 3,800 abandoned apartments, originally earmarked for families who’d been moved off their land, is back on the market after four failed auction attempts.】

item.title: Snap 开始在澳大利亚 16 岁以下用户禁用前检查用户年龄
item.description: Snap 公司将开始在澳大利亚检查许多用户的年龄，为下个月在全球范围内首次禁止 16 岁以下儿童使用社交媒体做准备。【原文：Snap Inc. will start checking many users’ ages in Australia as it prepares for a world-first social media ban for under-16s next month.】

item.title: 必和必拓称不再考虑与英美资源集团合作
item.description: 必和必拓集团表示不再考虑与英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）合作。【原文：BHP Group said it was no longer considering a tie-up with Anglo American Plc.】

item.title: 据说英美资源集团将拒绝必和必拓的最新收购建议
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，矿商英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）拒绝了必和必拓集团（BHP Group）的最新接触，这增加了这家全球最大矿商达成交易的障碍。【原文：Miner Anglo American Plc has rejected the latest approach from BHP Group, according to people familiar with the situation, increasing the hurdles for the world’s biggest miner to secure a deal.】

item.title: 印度和加拿大将重启长期停滞的贸易协定谈判
item.description: 印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）和加拿大总理马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）同意恢复双边自由贸易协定的讨论，这是两国关系升温的最新迹象。【原文：Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi and Canadian Prime Minister Mark Carney agreed to resume discussions on a bilateral free trade deal, the latest sign of warming relations between the two countries.】

item.title: 2025 年债券反弹面临新的数据真空，等待游戏开始了
item.description: 这轮反弹推动美国债券市场创下了自 2020 年以来最好的一年，但现在投资者对国债能否守住惊人涨幅仍心存疑虑。【原文：The rally that powered the US bond market toward its best year since 2020 has now left investors in suspense to see whether Treasuries can hold their impressive gains.】

item.title: 新西兰央行降息接近尾声，澳元兑新西兰元涨势将达顶峰
item.description: 澳元兑新西兰元可能已经触顶，因为分析师预测新西兰储备银行在本周预期降息后将不再那么鸽派。【原文：The Australian dollar may have already peaked against the kiwi, as analysts forecast the Reserve Bank of New Zealand will turn less dovish after an expected interest-rate cut this week.】

item.title: 银行、联邦调查局评估房地产金融技术供应商遭黑客攻击事件
item.description: 一家房地产金融技术供应商遭到黑客攻击，美国各大银行和抵押贷款机构周日都在努力评估自己是否受到数据泄露事件的影响。【原文：The hack of a technology vendor for real estate financiers left major American banks and mortgage lenders working Sunday to assess whether they were affected by the data breach.】

item.title: 贝森特表示本周将公布医保政策
item.description: 财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）表示，特朗普政府正在努力降低美国的医疗成本，并计划于本周宣布解决这一问题。【原文：Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said the Trump administration is working on bringing down US health-care costs and an announcement to address the issue is planned for this week.】

item.title: 期权市场在经历一周剧烈波动后发出日益焦虑的信号
item.description: 交易员们越来越担心，今年股市的涨势可能已经结束。【原文：Traders are growing increasingly worried that this year’s stock-market rally may be all but over.】

item.title: 一些被绑架的尼日利亚学生在农民帮助下逃脱
item.description: 周五，尼日利亚一所天主教学校的 50 名被绑架学生已逃离绑架者，返回家中。【原文：Fifty students who were abducted from a catholic school in Nigeria on Friday have escaped from their captors and returned home.】

item.title: 英伟达没有拯救市场。人工智能贸易的下一步是什么？
item.description: 华尔街原以为，英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）井喷式的盈利会平息投资者对人工智能股泡沫形成的担忧。但事实并非如此。【原文：Wall Street thought blowout earnings from Nvidia Corp. would calm investors’ nerves about a bubble forming in artificial intelligence stocks. They didn’t.】

item.title: 特朗普摇摆不定，交易员寻找下一个阿根廷
item.description: 新兴市场的资金经理们正在把下一笔大交易的目标锁定在拉丁美洲，因为即将到来的一波选举可能会重新绘制该地区的政治版图，有可能使一些国家与唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关系更加紧密。【原文：Emerging-market money managers are zeroing in on Latin America for their next big trade as a wave of upcoming elections could redraw the region’s political map, potentially aligning several countries more closely with Donald Trump.】

item.title: 除了新的人工智能，苹果 iOS 27 将是不折不扣的 "雪豹 "更新
item.description: 苹果公司的下一个主要 iPhone 软件更新 — iOS 27 — 将有两大要素：质量改进和人工智能功能。另外：关于蒂姆-库克（Tim Cook）即将离职的报道为时尚早，OpenAI 将继续挖角苹果工程师。最后，推出 iPhone Air 的设计师已经离职。【原文：Apple’s next major iPhone software update — iOS 27 — will have two major elements: quality improvements and artificial intelligence features. Also: The report on Tim Cook’s imminent departure as CEO is premature, and OpenAI continues poaching Apple engineers. Lastly, the iPhone Air designer who introduced the device has left the company.】
